amendment.description: Amendment prohibits agencies from impartially communicating with the public in order to generate support or opposition to a proposed rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 115-2 to prohibit agencies from impartially communicating with the public in order to gener ate support or opposition to a proposed rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 161 (Roll no. 36).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peterson amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 161 (Roll no. 36).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Peterson.
